item.description:
"Away We Go" is a contemporary comedy directed by Academy Award winner Sam Mendes from an original screenplay by Dave Eggers and Vendela Vida. The movie follows the journey of an expectant couple (John Krasinski of "The Office" and Maya Rudolph of Saturday Night Live), as they travel the U.S. in search of a place to put down roots and raise a family. Rounding out the cast are Jeff Daniels, Carmen Ejogo, Jim Gaffigan, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Josh Hamilton, Allison Janney, Melanie Lynskey, Chris Messina, Catherine Oâ€™Hara, and Paul Schneider. "Away We Go" is produced and co-financed with Focus by Big Beach.

Critics:

"...a self-satisfied film about insecure people, a quirky and episodic comic drama that squanders its genuine assets and ends up not as special as it tries to be."
Los Angeles Times

- Kenneth Turan
"...an exploratory and occasionally bittersweet trek that takes unexpected turns and winds up in an emotionally satisfying place."
USA Today

- Claudia Puig
"...this episodic dramedy -- starring tube familiars John Krasinski and Maya Rudolph as a rudderless couple seeking a place to call home while on the brink of parenthood -- emerges as an oddly sour, unappealing road-trip scenario..."
Variety

- Dennis Harvey
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby. The movie starts at 7 so let's meet no later than 6:45.
item.name: Away We Go
